title: [Epidemiology] New study suggests that masks and a good ventilation system are more important than social distancing for reducing the airborne spread of COVID-19 in classrooms

[Health] Nearly 40,000 children lost at least one parent to COVID in the United States. For comparison, the number of children that have been orphaned by the virus is nearly 13 times higher than the approximately 3,000 children who lost at least one parent in the 9/11 attacks
